name: motivmedia - Declutter Trello
description:
Makes the main menu an off-canvas menu that shows on mouse hover so that it can be kept open without losing so much space.

Some elements are removed, notably stickers and cover images. The latter are customizable.

For display widths equal to or below 1920px it removes/lowers paddings and margins from/between cards and lists.

user.name: Florian “Floutsch” Hartig
user.about: Working as the tech guy in an advertising agency motivmedia...

additional_info:
This style is intended for internal use within the company I work for, motivmedia. So while anybody's free to use it, be aware it might not perfectly fit your use-case.

In this release I removed the code hiding other activities than comments from the side menu as there are filtering options now. I did not update the screenshots, though.
